Booking assistant Rijbewijs B - Belgie: Booking assistant Driving License B - Belgium
Wij kunnen een examenplek voor jouw rege: We can arrange an exam spot for you within 2 weeks instead of 6 months!
Meer dan 1.000 tevreden gebruikers hebbe: More than 1,000 satisfied users were able to take their exam sooner
Have a question? We'd love to hear from you.
Bedankt voor je bericht! We nemen zo sne: Thank you for your message! We will contact you as soon as possible.
Er is iets misgegaan. Probeer het later: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
Zijn jullie verbonden aan SBAT, Autoveil: Are you affiliated with SBAT, Autoveiligheid or an exam centre?
Nee, Rijbewijsboeker is op geen enkele m: No, Rijbewijsboeker is in no way affiliated with, associated with or part of SBAT nv, Autoveiligheid or any other exam centre. We are an independent service that helps you find and book available exam dates.
Welke gegevens bewaren jullie en waarom?: What data do you store and why?
Wij bewaren enkel de gegevens die noodza: We only store the data necessary to register you for a driving exam, such as your name, email address and any data required by the exam centre (e.g. national register number, date of birth, address). This data is used exclusively to carry out your booking and is not sold or shared with third parties.
Hoe lang worden mijn gegevens bewaard?: How long is my data stored?
Uw gegevens worden bewaard zolang uw acc: Your data is stored as long as your account is active. You can have your account and all associated data deleted at any time via the settings or by contacting info@rijbewijsboeker.be.
Wat zijn mijn rechten met betrekking tot: What are my rights regarding my data?
Conform de GDPR heeft u recht op inzage,: Under the GDPR, you have the right to access, modify, delete and transfer your personal data. You also have the right to object to processing or request a restriction of processing. You can exercise these rights by contacting info@rijbewijsboeker.be.
Ja, onze service is volledig legaal. Wij: Yes, our service is completely legal. We use publicly accessible information on exam centre websites and automate the process of checking availability, which you would otherwise have to do manually. We act on behalf of and with the consent of the user.
Voer je e-mail en wachtwoord in om in te: Enter your email and password below to log in
Wij ondersteunen momenteel de volgende e: We currently support the following exam centres: Autoveiligheid: Deurne, Alken, Kontich, Geel, Haasrode and Bree. SBAT: Sint-Denijs-Westrem, Brakel, Eeklo, Erembodegem and Sint-Niklaas.
Wij zoeken een examenplek voor je die ve: We search for an exam spot that is available much sooner than 6 months. Based on our data, we usually find a suitable exam within two weeks.
